title: View from the outside only
review: It is hard to know whether the name is correct or not.  Some people say only the Jama Masjid Mosque in Delhi is allowed to be called that.  Anyway, this is an imposing structure that not even the tourist information office can provide any historical information on.  Unlike the Jama Masjid in Delhi unbelievers cannot enter the mosque.  It dominates the skyline and overlooks the Flatts where a continuous cricket match is played.  Best photographed in the mornings for the best lit profile.

title: just a mosque
review: nothing so great about it ..it is just a mosque like any other .. people offer prayers thats all.. trying to beautify it with marbles etc

title: A landmark on the mall road
review: A while marble stoned mosque near mall road and bara bazaar. Its a landmark point for Nainitaal as the uphill and downhill traffic moves on the sides of this mosque-----One way traffic

title: Religious place
review: A big mosque built in mallital side of nainital, at a walking distance from Naina devi temple. However, we could not go inside it, we were said it is closed. Not sure it is closed for visitors or open only for the namaz timings. A nice place to click some snaps as the mosque is big and beautifully built.

title: looks imposing
review: situated on the flats this appears as the dominant structure in Nainital. it overshadows Nain temple

title: Famous mosque
review: This is very old and famous mosque. Mosque is in main market. Mosque is very big and well maintained. This place is also good to visit.

title: Simply divine
review: This mosque is really beautiful . The work on the walls is really intricate. Not many mosques are as beautiful . We did not go inside but clicked so many selfies .

title: Jama Mashid
review: This Mosque is located at the one end of the city near Tibetan market. It has big playground just opposite .

title: Jama Masjid-Nainital
review: Jama Masjid Nainital, located on the Mallital gaari parao near mallital police station was built in 1882 during the British Era.  This beautiful mosque has now turned into a tourist attraction. Just adjacent to the mosque there is a small cricket ground where local matches are held.

title: Most famous mosque in Nainital district
review: This is the most famous mosque located in mallital... The place is very peaceful and divine... Must visit place

title: Mosque
review: we can't enter in this, so we seen from outside, it is near Naina Devi temple, an open ground is here which is good for playing cricket

title: On the outside -- super building...
review: Obviously, since this is a working temple, you should not try to get inside. However, the building is great from the outside... It is very large, with beautiful ornaments... worthy coming closer and reflecting on its beauty...
